ralgorithm

Class KTunnel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ralgorithm.KTunnel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Movement

    public class KTunnel
extends java.lang.Object
implements Movement
    Implementation of KTunnel, which tunnels block trhoguh robot using 90 degree turns

    KTunnel is a O(k) movement that moves a block from a start position to an end position by pushing it through the robot

    Since:
    2/14/2016

    • Constructor Detail

      • KTunnel

        public KTunnel(Robot r,
               int k,
               Coordinate start,
               Coordinate end)
        Instantiates a kTunnel from start to end

        KTunnel finds a tunnel with at most k turns through the robot. Note: we may find a tunnel with fewer than k turns, however k we find must have the same parity as the given k (as start and end must be leaf nodes)

        Parameters:
        r - the Robot on which the kTunnel will be performed
        k - the number of turns in the tunnel
        start - the stating position of the module aka the Module to tunnel
        end - where the module will be tunneled to
